title: Searching for Home
description: Searching for Home is the amazing journey of Maddie, who leaves home in search for the missing element in her life, her father. Maddie and her horse Endora are soon joined by Leith, who has his own reasons for wanting to leave town. Maddie's heart warming and moving tale is full of unexpected dangers; she faces the cold, kidnap and injury but most of all, she faces her own future by unlocking what lies in the past.  Blurb:  Maddie hates not knowing anything about her real dad but her mum wonâ€™t talk about him. She already does the housework and her half-sister constantly destroys her stuff, so why is her mum expecting her to give up even more just because of a new baby? Maddie is determined to find her dad and make things right. She sets out on a dangerous adventure and is soon joined by Leith, who has his own reasons for wanting to leave town. They set off on the long journey with only her horse and his bike to get them there.
